reviews.customers_say: Customers find the kaftan comfortable and appreciate its design, with one noting its beautiful detail along the sides. The garment fits well, with one customer mentioning it has enough room to tuck their knees up, and they like its color, with one noting it looks better in person than in pictures. Customers describe the material as soft and smooth, and they find it generously sized with room to spare. While some customers find the fabric nice, others describe it as thin and flimsy. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy & Classy
items.body: I really like this Kaftan, I ordered the purple paisley color & the color is exactly as shown. I'm tall so this fits me perfectly hight wise lands a few inches above my ankles. I'm curvy brown girl & the One Size Fits All fits me well, enough room to tuck my knees up under it if im a little cold & don't feel like grabbing a blanket. Lol. It has a surprising beautiful detail along the sides, so when I raise my arms you can see the detail. Pros: Light, fabric doesn't wrinkle at all (my fav part), washes well, long enough for us tall girls, & beautiful color. Cons: can be a bit see through, so I would wear something underneath if running errands, although the V neck fits me perfectly when standing, when I sit down the V neck hikes up & chokes me, LOL, I have to remember to give it some slack before Insit down. Its still a 5/5 for me. I was hoping for the same pattern in blue, but I only see Black & Green, I might try the Green. Read more
items.author: CarlaRose

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Silky Smooth and Sexy
items.body: This is very cool and comfortable. It feels like it's made of silky scarves. I am 5'4" and 170 lbs, and it's roomy and a great length, just above my ankles. Read more
items.author: Brenda Baker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfy
items.body: I wear it out w/shorts underneath as well as a tank top, but super comfy and cool. I get complimented on it every time I wear it. Read more
items.author: samarie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Big and no shape..
items.body: Still big for me for a large to Xlarge that I usually buy. I have to put some string to add shape on it. Fabric is in good quality and I like the design. The color stand out. Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Striped, Rust Orange, Red, Off-white, White, Black & Turquoise, Orange Paisley, Purple, Yellow, Mustard Orange, Black Paisley, Mustard Yellow, Teal, Multicolor Purple Paisley Maxi Kaftan. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
